description: Hey! I'm Matt and a BME here at Tech. Been a Tech fan my whole life living in metro Atlanta and couldn't be more happy to be here now. I'm always down to go out and play a round of golf, go to Braves game, or chill with my bros anytime. If you're interested in playing ice hockey at Georgia Tech, going Greek, or stepping up your shorts game with some thigh liberating Chubbies, come find me and I'm always available to talk.
aspects: GAMEDAYS- TO HELL WITH georgia. Semiformal, Braves game tailgates, watermelon bust, chicken fing Wednesday and so much more.
involve: R&D Co-Op for Bard Medical Division
GT For the Kids Morale Leader
GT Relay for Life Spirit Committee
Georgia Tech Men's Club Ice Hockey Team
quotes: "Alright, I think I know where this is going."
name: Matt Shriver
